mapper.select: SELECT b.USED_IDX, b.USED_TITLE, b.USED_CONTENT, b.USED_PRICE, b.USED_IMG1, b.USED_IMG2, b.USED_IMG3, b.USED_IMG4, b.CREATED_AT, b.USED_DONE, b.USER_ID, u.USER_NICK AS USER_NICK, b.USED_LIKE FROM TB_USED b JOIN TB_USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID ORDER BY b.USED_IDX DESC

SELECT b.USED_IDX, b.USED_TITLE, b.USED_CONTENT, b.USED_PRICE, b.USED_IMG1, b.USED_IMG2, b.USED_IMG3, b.USED_IMG4, b.CREATED_AT, b.USED_DONE, b.USER_ID, u.USER_NICK AS USER_NICK, b.USED_LIKE FROM TB_USED b JOIN TB_USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE USED_IDX = #{USED_IDX}
